history.proof: intros x y H. apply rel_prime_sym in H. pose rel_prime_mult; auto. apply rel_prime_sym. apply rel_prime_sym. pose rel_prime_opp; auto. shelve.

In environment x, y : Z H : rel_prime y x r := rel_prime_mult : forall a b c : Z, rel_prime a b -> rel_prime a c -> rel_prime a (b * c) Unable to unify "Zis_gcd (- ?M1856) (- ?M1857) 1" with "Zis_gcd x (- y) 1".
